creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: male figure holding a sword down with both hands and looking behind him, up at an owl flying near a tree; disembodied head near PR foot; image is framed by a tree on either side
marks:
Signature, Date, Inscription

inscribed in plate signed and dated in plate, bottom margin: [G. Rich
provenance: [Apparently William Weston, London; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: The Fatal Bellman
